DOC.brief_summary: To compare the safety and Efficiency of 20w 30w holmium laser device in treatment of 1-2 cm diameter kidney stones with Retrograde Intrarenal Surgery (RIRS).
DOC.brief_title: Comparison of Safety and Efficiency of 20w 30w Holmium Laser Device in Treatment of 1-2 cm Diameter Kidney Stones With RIRS
DOC.criteria: Patients who are between 1890 years old Patients undergoing RIRS for treatment of 12 cm diameter kidney stones Patients who have congenital urogenital abnormalities Patients who have previous stone surgery history
